title: Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack
description:
We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team. You'll work on building scalable web applications using modern technologies.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong proficiency in Python, JavaScript, and React
- Experience with PostgreSQL and MongoDB
- Knowledge of AWS services
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:
- Experience with machine learning
- Knowledge of GraphQL
- Previous startup experience
requirements: Strong proficiency in Python, JavaScript, and React

title: Frontend Developer - React Specialist
description:
Join our dynamic team as a Frontend Developer! We're building the next generation of web applications.

What you'll do:
- Develop responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
- Write clean, maintainable code

Requirements:
- 3+ years of frontend development experience
- Expert knowledge of React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript
- Experience with CSS frameworks (Tailwind, Bootstrap)
- Knowledge of state management (Redux, Zustand)
- Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
- Understanding of REST APIs and GraphQL
requirements: Expert knowledge of React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript
Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
Understanding of REST APIs and GraphQL

title: Backend Engineer - Python/Django
description:
We're seeking a Backend Engineer to help us build robust data processing systems.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable backend services
- Work with Django, PostgreSQL, and Redis
- Build and maintain APIs
- Optimize database queries and performance
- Collaborate with data science team

Requirements:
- 4+ years of Python development experience
- Strong experience with Django framework
- Proficiency with PostgreSQL and database design
- Experience with Redis and caching strategies
- Knowledge of RESTful API design
- Experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines
- Strong understanding of software architecture patterns
requirements: Proficiency with PostgreSQL and database design
Experience with Redis and caching strategies
Experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines
Strong understanding of software architecture patterns
nice_to_have: Experience with Celery and background tasks

title: DevOps Engineer - Cloud Infrastructure
description:
Join our infrastructure team to help scale our cloud operations!

What you'll do:
- Manage and scale cloud infrastructure on AWS
- Implement CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions
- Containerize applications using Docker and Kubernetes
- Monitor system performance and reliability
- Automate deployment and scaling processes

Requirements:
- 3+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
- Strong experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
- Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Knowledge of monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
- Experience with Linux system administration
- Strong scripting skills (Bash, Python)
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
Strong experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)

title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning
description:
We're looking for a Data Scientist to join our AI research team!

Responsibilities:
- Develop machine learning models for various business problems
- Analyze large datasets to extract insights
- Collaborate with engineering teams to deploy models
- Present findings to stakeholders
- Stay current with latest ML research and techniques

Requirements:
- Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
- 3+ years of experience in machine learning
- Proficiency in Python and R
- Experience with ML libraries (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Strong statistical analysis skills
- Experience with SQL and data manipulation
- Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
3+ years of experience in machine learning
Experience with ML libraries (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Experience with SQL and data manipulation
nice_to_have: Previous experience in fintech or healthcare

title: Full Stack Developer - Node.js/React
description:
Join our creative team as a Full Stack Developer!

What you'll work on:
- Build full-stack web applications
- Develop RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
- Create responsive frontend interfaces with React
- Work with MongoDB and PostgreSQL databases
- Implement user authentication and authorization
- Deploy applications to cloud platforms

Requirements:
- 3+ years of full-stack development experience
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, and React
- Experience with Express.js framework
- Knowledge of MongoDB and PostgreSQL
- Experience with RESTful API development
- Understanding of authentication systems (JWT, OAuth)
- Experience with version control (Git)
requirements: Strong proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, and React

title: Mobile App Developer - React Native
description:
We're seeking a Mobile App Developer to join our growing mobile team!

Responsibilities:
- Develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers
- Implement native features and third-party integrations
- Optimize app performance and user experience
- Maintain and update existing mobile applications

Requirements:
- 2+ years of mobile development experience
- Strong experience with React Native
- Knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript
- Experience with mobile app deployment (iOS/Android)
- Understanding of mobile UI/UX principles
- Experience with REST APIs and state management
- Knowledge of mobile testing frameworks
requirements: Experience with REST APIs and state management

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description:
Lead cloud architecture initiatives for enterprise clients!

What you'll do:
- Design scalable cloud solutions for enterprise clients
- Lead migration projects to cloud platforms
- Provide technical guidance to development teams
- Evaluate and recommend cloud technologies
- Ensure security and compliance in cloud environments

Requirements:
- 5+ years of cloud architecture experience
- Strong experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP
- Knowledge of cloud security best practices
- Experience with infrastructure as code
- Strong communication and leadership skills
- Understanding of microservices architecture
- Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
requirements: Strong experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP
Knowledge of cloud security best practices

title: Product Manager - Technical
description:
Join our product team to drive technical product strategy!

Responsibilities:
- Define product roadmap and strategy
- Collaborate with engineering teams on technical requirements
- Analyze user feedback and market trends
- Manage product backlog and prioritize features
- Work with stakeholders to align product vision

Requirements:
- 4+ years of product management experience
- Technical background (CS degree or equivalent experience)
- Experience with agile development methodologies
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Experience with product analytics tools
- Understanding of software development lifecycle
requirements: Technical background (CS degree or equivalent experience)

title: QA Automation Engineer
description:
Help us ensure the highest quality in our software products!

What you'll do:
- Design and implement automated test suites
- Develop test automation frameworks
- Perform manual testing when needed
- Collaborate with development teams
- Maintain and improve testing processes

Requirements:
- 3+ years of QA automation experience
- Strong experience with test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress)
- Proficiency in programming languages (Python, JavaScript)
- Experience with CI/CD integration
- Knowledge of testing methodologies
- Experience with bug tracking systems
- Strong attention to detail
requirements: Strong experience with test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress)
nice_to_have: Previous experience with mobile app testing
